project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement file reading functionality to load the text file
Implement word counting functionality to calculate word frequencies
Implement a sorting mechanism to determine the top 10 most common words
Implement a display method to show the top 10 words in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
